website_summaries.verdict: Hilarious, creative, expansive, and overflowing with off-the-wall action, Sunset Overdrive is an inexpensive white-knuckle thrill ride you can’t miss out on.
pros: Survive and explore Sunset City your way
cons: We hope you appreciate rude humor

website_summaries.verdict: Sunset Overdrive is thoroughly fun and offers a guilt-free, action-packed campaign. Both its styling and personality are impressively realized -- it's smart, and comically self-aware.
pros: Sunset Overdrive is a diverse open-world action game that features over-the-top weapons, a city brimming with style, a parkour system that's a blast to execute and a self-awareness that continually breaks the fourth wall
cons: Traversing the world has a significant learning curve and some missions and boss battles are frustrating, but it's nothing you can't handle -- eventually

customer_reviews.title: but I'll say I've really enjoyed the time I have put into this game
customer_reviews.text: As with all of my video games I haven't had much time to play this one, but I'll say I've really enjoyed the time I have put into this game!! Easy and fun character creation with plenty of neat options and super fun game play - you can jump and run and slide on practically everything and it has some of the most ridiculous guns I've seen in a game, right off the bat. Goofy plot and characters make for a fun time.
customer_reviews.author: Beyondthedepths

customer_reviews.title: Solid weaponry, funny characters, okay story line
customer_reviews.text: Good game with interesting characters and historical weaponry. Open world game with semi repetitive combat. Racking up combos and sort. I will say though this game does look very gorgeous. And if you are the type of person that likes to collect everything in a game, be prepared to be spending LOADS of time collecting everything in this game. There is literally hundreds of items to collect. WOW is there a lot! All in all it is a fun game though. Good game to pick up once and awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Honest Review Guy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and exciting gaming experience!
customer_reviews.text: Fun, adventures, action packed, hours of game play, character editing, gun/weapon upgrades, crazy character outfits, and most importantly amazing graphics! Definitely a 5 star experience! If you are looking for a game that is action packed and has endless hours of game play, well then you came across the perfect game for you! Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Epic
customer_reviews.text: I love this game so much. It's probably one of my favorites for the xbox one that I've played so far. It's very action packed yet lighthearted and the dialogue is hilarious. I also love how you are able to customize your character whenever you feel like it. (Also note that you can change the gender of your character by visiting Calista, you don't have to restart your game)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sunset overdrive is one of those games you shouldn't waste time playing
customer_reviews.text: Sunset overdrive is one of those games you shouldn't waste time playing, but WANT to waste time playing. Lets be honest, you are not purchasing this game for the graphics, you aren't purchasing for the story either. This game is over the top, comical and action packed. My only gripe is seeing this game fluctuate in price dramatically. i purchased this game for 25 dollars, however i have seen this as much as 35 or so, but as cheap as 10 bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Rob S.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult controls
customer_reviews.text: When the developer chooses to use multiple pushes on the same button for different functions instead of just using another button, I know it's time to quit their game. They have never been good at implementing that and never will be. It never works in games.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: SUCH a awesome game for such a low price
customer_reviews.text: SUCH a awesome game for such a low price!!! It's Saints Row meets Dead Island meets Left 4 Dead and more!! If you love fun/real customizable characters,a kinda comic book style world/fighting style,and a LOT of 3rd/4th wall breaking (even some Breaking Bad references lmao) then you'll absolutely love this game. Definitely worth adding to your collection. 5/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: HalloweenQueen

customer_reviews.title: Great Game, that reminds me of Jet Grind (Set) Radio
customer_reviews.text: Quirky action game that reminds me a lot of Jet Grind (Set) Radio. A game the drips with humor and is really fun to play. Controls are tight and responsive and simple enough to remember without much training. Small learning curve. Was free on XBOX Live, but if it isn't anymore, buy it anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Relax, have a sense of humor, and consider playing this game
customer_reviews.text: Excellent game, uses ideas from other games like Mirrors Edge and Assassins Creed, but brings them all together for one seamless experience. It may get stale after 15 hours or so but still worth your hard earned dollar considering a two hour movie in Theaters is around $14. The game asks you to have a sense of humor to enjoy it. It has a punk rock/rock n roll feel to it so you have to deal with that. Some folks might prefer turning off the music
customer_reviews.author: Arsalonymous

customer_reviews.title: Instant Classic
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the first xbox one games i have bought and i have to say, Its an Instant Classic!!!! very fun and a lot of side missions besides the main campaign game, if you like walking, running, jumping, and flying around a city environment, and shooting at stuff, this is the game for you. this game reminds me of the popular zombie game Left 4 Dead, only it takes place in a more modern environment a large variety of guns,(that can be upgraded), and is more comical, instead of dark and semi-scary.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Romero

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GAME!
customer_reviews.text: i was sceptical at first that the seller was selling this product so cheat but i go the product, new unopened and perfect. really fun game, prepared me for what's to come for in the new spiderman game. before anyone starts saying anything, yes i know the spiderman game is going to be an exclusive and yes i have a ps4 as well...
customer_reviews.author: Angel I.

customer_reviews.title: very very bad matchmaking
customer_reviews.text: The single player campaign deserves 5 stars but if your going to unclude a multiplayer, dont have it die off so quickly. It takes a lot of time to find games, in my experience there is only one or two games going on at time so you cannot choose the place that you want to play at. I just had my matchmaking looking in all areas and it still timed out. its nearly impossible to get the chaos squad acheivements unless you are playing with friends.
customer_reviews.author: ryannort

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Game
customer_reviews.text: Initially I wasn't too keen on buying this game. It looked a little stupid imo. BUuuttt everyone kept saying how great it was so once it hit a decent price I went ahead and bought it. Oh my god its so much fun. Not much replay value (unless im missing something) and i'm not big on multiplayer on any game these days. But the single player campaign is funny, fast paced and has a decent story. Day one purchase for sunset overdrive 2!
customer_reviews.author: Tomiso

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game
customer_reviews.text: The game arrived yesterday (May 6) after 2 months of waiting, but it is not seller's fault, Mexican postal service is not the best. The game arrived in perfect condition and works as expected. I love the game and is a must have if you like to kill tons of mutants. Visuals are stunning and there is killing action everywhere. Weapons are so funny. I really recommend the game. Xbox One exclusive.
customer_reviews.author: Ryszard Zerynger Mata

customer_reviews.title: So much fun.
customer_reviews.text: Very fun and looks even better with Xbox one X. Simple crazy fun for under $20.00. But beware because this is a mature title with very colorful graphics and language.
customer_reviews.author: Mariano Aleman

customer_reviews.title: Great Xbox console
customer_reviews.text: Great new ip. Great graphics and fun gameplay. Fun platforming and shooting game. Hope there is a sequel in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet gem of violence and hilarity!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best games you haven't heard of. Hilarious! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Chris F.

customer_reviews.title: This has become my favorite game for XB1
customer_reviews.text: This has become my favorite game for XB1. Very fun, like the music, and the whole game is goofy without being childish.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel James Fries

customer_reviews.title: Wish they would make a sequel
customer_reviews.text: One of the best and most creative first party titles on Xbox, non stop fast paced fun and has a unique combo loop. Can't suggest enough.
customer_reviews.author: warren hooper

customer_reviews.title: Super fun game and the mechanics are sublime
customer_reviews.text: Super fun game and the mechanics are sublime. The only problem I now have is that the game is so fast-paced and changes so quickly that my attention span after playing it is so low I can no longer play any other game that requires concentration much less hold down a job to pay my mortgage and feed myself. 10/10: would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game!
customer_reviews.text: This game is great! Insomniac Games is one of my favorite game studios. I fell in love with Ratchet and Clank back in the day and this game mirrors the same weapon system and progression as those games. It's basically like GTA with lots of character and humor (different than GTA). GTA has been getting kind of stale for me but this was invigorating for me.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Pretty funn time!
customer_reviews.text: It is a fun little game, geared towards younger people I would say, but some mindless fun. It has some good character customization, decent missions. The movement has to be relearned all over again when you come back to this game but not a big deal. It has got its own Deadpool-esque fourth wall kind of style which is appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: B.O.

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry Halo 5 and Gears 4 but this is the first game that made me love the Xbox One. The guns and the upgrades and the movement were done so well. I can't play a game anymore without wanting to grind on the rails. It's like a fun version of Infamous. I can't say enough about this game. I hope there's a sequel.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Turner

customer_reviews.title: Most fun I've had on the Xbox One yet
customer_reviews.text: I'm late to the party. Passed on this game when it when it was released for one reason or another, but better late then never. Awesome game, great garage punk soundtrack, just all around fun. To my surprise, a year and a half after release there are still people playing multiplayer (Chaos Squad) which is a bonus for anyone just getting around to playing this game. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: SUNSET OVERDRIVE, RuLeS!
customer_reviews.text: I love this GAME, the details to the charactera are ALSOME. The game play feels like SOMETHING I've played in the past, but ITS new, exciting, fun, different, impressive, and ADDICTING. So much so that I had to TELL all of my friends about it. Who have either brought the game, borrowed from one of their friends, rented it from gamefly, and or spent the night over my HOUSE to play the GAME!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Crackdown meets Dead Rising
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence about purchasing this game and held off for several months before actually making the purchase, but I am glad that I did make this purchase. It's like Crackdown meets Dead Rising with fantastic graphics and commentary. If you enjoy killing hordes of monsters/zombies in other games, than you will enjoy playing this game.
customer_reviews.author: puredrive07

customer_reviews.title: New favorite game, hands down
customer_reviews.text: I love this game to DEATH. It's hilarious, the gameplay is perfection (once you get used to it), and all the weapons are so unique and fun to use. I highly recommend this to anyone that appreciates games that are centered around pure, unadulterated FUN, because that's what Sunset Overdrive delivers. There's no deep backstory or anything like that, and the game knows it (the characters even break the fourth wall to make fun of how implausible the story is). It's purely designed to be a fun and ridiculous escape from real life, and it accomplishes that incredibly well. My only complaint is that it's over :( P.S. the DLC is also top notch, if a bit short-lived
customer_reviews.author: Ronlad McMuffins

customer_reviews.title: Great fun game
customer_reviews.text: Great fun game. Love the Aesthetics of this game and the bouncing around sliding on wires mechanics. Can't go wrong if you are tired of the COD's and Battle Fields of the world.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and it's a great tony hawk
customer_reviews.text: Another game you should have for your Xbox one . Cheap and it's a great tony hawk , open world , shooter type of game. Another game I need to pass. If you wanna see how it is look up some gameplay on YouTube maybe theradbrad.

customer_reviews.title: Most fun game on Xbone

customer_reviews.title: It even has a profanity filter!
customer_reviews.text: Love this game and on the Xbox One it looks phenomenal! Our 10 year old also loves it. But the one thing that makes this game a real,winner is that you can block the profanity! So instead of hearing cuss words he hears a beep sound. You can also block the gore if you find that offensive. Wish more game developers would install this feature.

customer_reviews.title: It knows it's a game and it's great because of it
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this game, It's the type of game where you can get as much or as little out of it as you like. I was able to learn the controls quickly and the gameplay flowed very well. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is a fan of having fun while playing a game. It's a game that knows it's a game and that is part of what makes it so fun to play.

Just running around the city you'll find plenty of static events unfolding to keep you entertained. The co-op multiplayer is a blast too. And the weapons are as crazy fun to watch as they are crazy fun to fire.

customer_reviews.text: The game does a good job of making itself original but the gameplay isn't as engaging as you'd hope.

customer_reviews.title: Great for avid gamers.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I loved this game. I am not really into gaming, but I sometimes play them. This game was perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Thee Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Silly, fun over the top madness.
customer_reviews.text: Funny, fun, ridiculous game. The gameplay itself is great, the mechanics are easy so it is accessible to a lot of different types of gamers. The storyline is good as well and odd. The "gore" is so cartoony it renders it comical (intentionally I am sure). The cursing is rampant but can be turned off (as can be gore) if you are offended by language or cartoony blood. I let me 12 year old play this with gore but no cursing and it might actually make the dialogue funnier!
customer_reviews.author: NosniborT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game, not super easy and not too difficult
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no bad things to say about this game. Overall I wasn't sure if I really wanted to get this game, considering I already have some I don't play. For the price and type of game it is, its very cool. I highly recommend

customer_reviews.text: This game is a lot of fun for me and my 9 year old. Lots of different options for weapons and a big open world to roam in.

customer_reviews.text: One of the most funnest games you will ever play!! If you like Jet Set Radio future, the saints row franchise, 90s punk music, and outdated references. Then this the best game for you.

customer_reviews.text: This game is ridiculous. But I like ridiculous so it worked out well for me. It's worth getting just to die in the game, the death cutscenes are outrageous.

customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun. This is a game that absolutely does not take itself seriously -- very tongue-in-cheek. I wasn't sure I'd like it at first, but I ended up loving it.

customer_reviews.text: Fun game with a lot of fun pop culture references and humorous dialogue. Down to four stars because I don't see much to keep me playing once it's over. Not all that many side quests so the only thing to keep you going is achievement grinding and maybe chaos squad. Overall though, lots of fun especially at $25.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the collection

customer_reviews.title: Sunset Overdirve 5/5
customer_reviews.text: One of the most Innovative games to date. I have played both Infamous and this and feel like Sunset Overdrive is the better one of the two when it comes to open world content. Not only is it full of content it has alot of things to collect and has great humor in its jokes too. 5/5 to one of my new facvorite games of this generation.

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy!  Amazing Xbox One exclusive.
customer_reviews.text: Sunset overdrive offers the best combination of open world, top notch comedic writing, and creative gun and traversal gameplay. It's a platform first, with an amazing and simple shooter control scheme.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best game i played on My xbox its really really nice .

customer_reviews.title: A great exclusive for the Xbox ONE
customer_reviews.text: A great exclusive for the Xbox ONE. full open world, great quests, crazy weapons, and zombies mutated from bad soda?! It's great!

customer_reviews.title: Great game to burn some time in between major titles!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously addicting! Love the option to turn off violence/strong language so my kids can watch me get into some Over-charged shenanigans!

customer_reviews.title: Meh. I could do without the jerky controls and ...
customer_reviews.text: Meh. I could do without the jerky controls and ultra-chaotic gameplay. This game is not for me, but objectively I could see where it has value.

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining, Fun , and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Sunset Overdrive had a Very fun world to play in and is refreshing and enjoyable.

customer_reviews.author: Saruman

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a realistic game? Stay far away from this one. Looking for something really fun in ridiculous measure? You just scored. Had tons of fun playing, finally a game with next gen graphics that's actually good. Old school gamers will like the sometimes a little too cheesy but still made me laugh humer about gaming in general. The punk rock vibes were sweet too. Not for tools that only play stuff like cod. For real gamers with soul that are down with something ridiculous for the sake of fun. Plays like a tony hawk game a little bit where you grind and stuff but have to kill while you do it. Sweet!
customer_reviews.author: dude mon

customer_reviews.title: Play it censored or uncensored! Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Insomniac? I totally forgot about these guys! Remember Resistance? Sure you do! This is a great developer, and I was surprised to see them making an XBOX one Exclusive! They haven't lost their tough for greatness. IF you like to shoot monsters and all sorts of vile creatures with guns, lots of bloods and profanity, then this game is for you. Controls are easy to jump into, but difficult to master. Fantastic graphics and funny characters. I wouldn't recommend little children playing this one, it's for grown ups, but if you think they just have to play, you can bleep out the language and Gore! That's a plus for any parent. I wish all rated M games would do this.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So fun and sassy, they really knew their target audience when developing this game.

product_meta.title: Sunset Overdrive
product_meta.description: Platform:Xbox One| Edition:StandardSunset Overdrive transforms an open-world apocalypse into your tactical playground. Zip, grind and wall-run across Sunset City while using a devastating, unconventional arsenal. With hyper-agility, unique weapons, and customizable special abilities, Sunset Overdrive rewrites the rules of traditional shooters and delivers an explosive and irreverent adventure in the end times.
feature_bullets: An Open World with No Rules: Leap off buildings, run along walls, and grind power lines and rails to destroy your foes from every angle.
Lethal Weapons: Collect and upgrade an arsenal of unconventional weapons that use items like dynamite, fireworks, harpoons, and acid to destroy your enemies.
Mayhem with Friends: Seamlessly transition from campaign to Chaos Squad, an 8-player cooperative experience.
